import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "../Style/LandingPage.css"; const UserLogin = () => { let params = useParams(); // console.log(params.id); let userId = params.id; let [userData, setUserData] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.org/users/${userId}`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setUserData(data)); }, [userData]); let con = useRef(); let emailField = useRef(); let pswField = useRef(); let navigate = useNavigate(); let signInClick = () => { con.current.classList.remove("sign-up-mode"); }; let signUpClick = () => { con.current.classList.add("sign-up-mode"); }; let {firstname,lastname,}=userData return ( <>

{userData.firstname}

Sign in User

Or sign in with social platform

{/*

Don't have an account? Sign up

*/}

{/*

Already have an account? Sign in

*/}

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Quibusdam eaque eius temporibus illo dolor perspiciatis.

); }; export default UserLogin;
